sentences: Chair Estrada noted that COP-7 had adopted frameworks for building capacity in developing countries and EITs.
The Secretariat reported on progress made in their implementation, stressing the need to exchange information on experiences prior to the review of the frameworks at COP-9.
The G-77/CHINA welcomed funding to facilitate implementing capacity building activities, and supported further efforts in this regard.
The CG-11 stressed the importance of capacity building, in particular as Protocol ratification progresses.
Chair Estrada took note of questions raised by delegates regarding GEF funding and said he would prepare draft conclusions addressing these concerns.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
